name: NBCNews
text: President Trump declines to commit to a peaceful transfer of power, if he loses: "Get rid of the ballots and we'll have a very peaceful — there won't be a transfer, frankly. There will be a continuation." https://t.co/KSMxKUwg1z

name: NBCNews
text: RT @kailanikm: A few fires here in downtown #Louisville this eve after #BreonnaTaylor news. https://t.co/8veZXqLaUo

name: NBCNews
NBCNews
text:
RT @thereportnbc: A grand jury announced a fmr. Louisville police officer has been indicted on charge of “wanton endangerment” in relation to the Breonna Taylor case. The officer who shot Taylor was not indicted.

Catch the full story on #TheEveningReport on @Quibi: https://t.co/dEEpZ6Zgap https://t.co/cbAtP8GwM5

name: NBCNews
text: The grand jury's decision to bring no direct charges against officers for Breonna Taylor's killing ignited resentment, disappointment and a wave of criticism against AG Cameron as he tried to tamp down the outrage and what he referred to as "mob justice." https://t.co/7B051OwQaa

name: NBCNews
text: RT @shomaristone: BREAKING: Protesters march from the Department of Justice to Black Lives Matter Plaza near the White House. They are outraged over the grand jury’s announcement about the fatal shooting of #BreonnaTaylor. text: A woman who was captured on video using a racial slur and hurling a bottle at a Black runner in New York City has been charged with attempted assault as a hate crime and aggravated harassment, authorities say. https://t.co/zt1tB9XqeA
